bill_title: require the state to assume the responsibility for legal expenses of certain persons in the state's custody.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the state to assume the responsibility for legal expenses of certain persons in the state's custody. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. If any person is in the custody of the Department of Corrections or any other state agency, the state shall assume the responsibility for the legal expenses related to the criminal prosecution of that person that occurs after the date the state took custody of the person. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
